eb5d9df6-9ace-40e8-8f49-67d34898eb6c.description: Completion of BREW 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 require demonstration of basic knowledge of brewing science from the biochemistry of beer to the importance of ingredient selection and its effect on flavor and quality. Demonstration of competency is accomplished via regular beer brewing requirements. This badge when combined with the Brewing Operations Badge, results in the Certificate in Brewing Science and Operations.

149fb1b8-1ac4-4ae0-8ffd-58e8257ca2de.description: Completion of BREW 1750 and 2750 require demonstration of basic knowledge of brewery operations from packaging and distribution to record-keeping and accounting. Demonstration of competency is accomplished based on applied projects in the areas of packaging and the development of a business plan for a brewery. This badge when combined with the Brewing Science Badge, results in the Certificate in Brewing Science and Operations.
